gim.traveler.name: Путешественник
gim.anemo_traveler.star.1:
§7§l1
«Бушующий ураган».§r
Способность «§nЛадонь вихря§r» стягивает противников и предметы в радиусе пяти метров.
gim.anemo_traveler.star.3:
§7§l3
§7§l«Хранящий бриз».§r
На 10% снижает получаемый героем урон, когда активна «§nЛадонь вихря§r».
gim.anemo_traveler.star.4:
§7§l4
§7§l«Плетение ветров».§r
На 20% уменьшает сопротивление стихии Анемо у врагов, которые получили урон от «§nВзрывного торнадо§r». Если сработало поглощение стихий, то враги также получают -20% сопротивления от урона поглощенного элемента.
gim.artifact_set.adventure2.name: Искатель приключений, 2 предмета:
gim.artifact_set.adventure4.name: Искатель приключений, 4 предмета:
gim.artifact_set.adventure4.description: Восстанавливает 20% HP при добыче ценной руды
gim.anemo_traveler.attack_skill: Обычная атака: серия из 5 быстрых ударов
gim.anemo_traveler.elemental_skill:
Ладонь вихря: Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you.
The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
Elemental Absorption
If the vortex comes into contact with §9Hydro§r/§cPyro§r/§bCryo§r/§dElectro§r, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use
gim.anemo_traveler.burst_skill:
Gust Surge: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.
Elemental Absorption
If the tornado comes into contact with §9Hydro§r/§cPyro§r/§bCryo§r/§dElectro§r, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
gim.anemo_traveler.passive_skill_1: Slitting Wind: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.
gim.anemo_traveler.passive_skill_2: Second Wind: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
gim.configgui.indicateDamage: Should Genshin Impact Mod render damage amount indication? Disable is you have any other damage indicator mods
gim.configgui.indicateReactions: Should Genshin Impact Mod render name of elemental reactions occured? Usually it's very informative!
gim.configgui.levelUpTime: Time (int minutes) which causes world level increase. After server world exist this amount of time, it's level increases by one.
gim.configgui.levelScaling: Multiplier for entity on max level for scaling attributes: attack/defence/HP. For example, entity on max level is 5x bigger than on 1 level
gim.configgui.maxLevelAttackMultiplier: Multiplier for entity on max level for scaling attack damage. For example, entity attack on max level is 5x bigger than on 1 level
gim.chat.parametric_transformer.already_: Вы можете использовать Параметрический Преобразователь через %s
